newsitem.title: UK: MAM says "no comment" on Merrill bid talk.
newsitem.headline: MAM says "no comment" on Merrill bid talk.

text.p: Mercury Asset Management Group Plc declined to comment on Wednesday on market talk, fuelled by a newspaper report, that Merrill Lynch is considering a bid for the company.
"We don't comment on market rumours," said a spokesman.
The stock rose 30p to 1,372-1/2p on the talk.

A report in Wednesday's issue of the Guardian newspaper said, "While the story is not particularly new, it is some months since the idea circulated City dealing desks. More importantly, the particular market shrewdy who was spreading the tale yesterday is known to have an extremely good track record".
